name: Body Double
description:
A shooter without shooting.

Bait your enemies into shooting their friends by possessing their bodies.

Walk a mile in their shoes, but more likely walk a few steps before jumping ship as their body experiences a bullet.

Controls 

WASD / Arrow keys - Move

Left Mouse - Take over highlighted enemy

Right Mouse - Slow time

Shift / Space - Dash

Thing's I'd like to change / add after the voting period is over. 

  • Fix the enemy A.I. do they're not idiots
  • Make it more obvious where the bar is that shows you how much time slow / dash you have left
  • Make it so the time slow / dash bar is also the health bar for the enemy and you when you're inhabiting their body
  • More enemy types / actual levels
  • Make dying not as jarring as it is currently 
  • Just basically rewrite the game from scratch lmao
